document.full_text: nhl general managers, facing an increase in concussions on the ice, backed away from banning hits to the head but expressed confidence on wednesday they could make the game safer without a rule change.
document.title: no ban on head hits but gms hope for safer game
lines_and_colors: nhl general managers, facing an increase in concussions on the ice, backed away from banning hits to the head but expressed confidence on wednesday they could make the game safer without a rule change.
